title: SIP-170: Inflation Diversion for L2 Incentives
body:
SIP-170 https://sips.synthetix.io/sips/sip-170 proposes to to divert the 25K SNX weekly incentives for L2 stakers currently being covered by the sDAO to instead come from the inflationary SNX token supply.

Are you in favor of this proposal?
author: 0x2c68e09d3a87626d61Cd9ed647d08d1DEA280338
